resources.string: Move model around the detected surface
Rotate the model by using two fingers
Zoom in or out on the model by using a pinch gesture
Transform your space with the power of augmented reality. Visualize your furniture in real-time, right in your home.
Browse through a wide selection of furniture and find the perfect pieces for your home. With AR, you can see how they fit in your space before purchasing.
Now that you\'ve seen how your new furniture looks in your home, it\'s time to add it to your cart and checkout. Get started with the most convenient shopping experience.
